Expert_Aptitude_MCQ_Questions.question_text: A tank is filled by three pipes A, B, and C. A fills the tank in 4 hours, B in 6 hours, and C in 8 hours. If all the pipes are opened together, how long will it take to fill the tank?
A man can row 9 km/h in still water. If the speed of the current is 3 km/h, how long will it take him to row 12 km upstream?
A sum of money amounts to $3,600 after 2 years at 10% compound interest per annum. What was the principal amount?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word 'PERMUTATION' be arranged?
If the ratio of the ages of two persons is 4:5 and the sum of their ages is 45 years, what will be their respective ages after 5 years?
